name: JellyFarm
description:
Hi!

This game is my first game and I am happy for the result. But I keep improving this game , please don't rude. And Please Write your thoughts in the comments so that I can improve myself.

-My First Game

-12 Jelly Type

-2 Upgrade Type

-Unlockable Jellies

-Earnable Medal

-Cute Sfx Sounds And Music

If you like the game, You can donate me to improve myself.
